description: Lists all instance types and available features for a given OpenSearch or Elasticsearch version.

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description: The version of OpenSearch or Elasticsearch, in the format Elasticsearch_X.Y or OpenSearch_X.Y. Defaults to the latest version of OpenSearch.

nested_items.name: InstanceTypeDetails
nested_items.description: Lists all supported instance types and features for the given OpenSearch or Elasticsearch version.

nested_items.name: EncryptionEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether encryption at rest and node-to-node encryption are supported for the instance type.

nested_items.name: CognitoEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether Amazon Cognito access is supported for the instance type.

nested_items.name: AppLogsEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether logging is supported for the instance type.

nested_items.name: AdvancedSecurityEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether fine-grained access control is supported for the instance type.

nested_items.name: WarmEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether UltraWarm is supported for the instance type.

nested_items.name: InstanceRole
nested_items.description: Whether the instance acts as a data node, a dedicated master node, or an UltraWarm node.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: The supported Availability Zones for the instance type.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Send the request again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.
